title: My Hidden Sin - The Tale [Album](2013)
description:
My Hidden Sin is a Melodic Death Metal  from France. Formed in 2010 and they released they  first and Unsigned/independent studio album called The Tale, here's the tracklist:




1.	 Slave of Fate
	 
2.	 When Death Is Late
	
3.	 The Judgement	

4.	 Le paradis de Stan
	 
5.	 Come Here to Get Whipped
		 
6.	 Prison Break	
 
7.	 Seul contre tous
	
8.	 Before My Life	
	 
9.	 Resurrection	
 
10.	 Utopia	04:11	
 
11.	 Desillusion
	 
12.	 Redeption	
	 
13.	 Suicide
